6.title: CPU Utilization

7.title: Memory Utilization

8.title: Pod Utilization

9.title: CPU Requests Commitment

10.title: Memory Requests Commitment

11.title: CPU Limits Commitment

12.title: Memory Limits Commitment

13.title: CPU Usage per Namespace

15.title: CPU Quota
15.query:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace, timeframe: timeframe(from: $dt_timeframe_from, to: $dt_timeframe_to)
| fields id, Name = entity.name
| filter in(id, classicEntitySelector(concat("type(CLOUD_APPLICATION_NAMESPACE),toRelationship.isClusterOfNamespace(type(KUBERNETES_CLUSTER),entityName.equals(", $Cluster, "))")))
| lookup [
  timeseries values = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.cpu_usage, default:0), by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace}, from: -2m, nonempty: true
  | fieldsAdd cpu_usage = arrayFirst(values)
  | limit 20000
], sourceField:id, lookupField:dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace, fields:{cpu_usage}
| lookup [
  timeseries values = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.cpu_throttled, default:0), by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace}, from: -2m
  | fieldsAdd cpu_throttled = arrayFirst(values)
  | limit 20000
], sourceField:id, lookupField:dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace, fields:{cpu_throttled}
| lookup [
  timeseries values = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.requests_cpu), by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace}, from: -2m
  | fieldsAdd requests_cpu = arrayFirst(values)
  | limit 20000
], sourceField:id, lookupField:dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace, fields:{requests_cpu}
| fieldsAdd requests_cpu_percent = cpu_usage / requests_cpu * 100
| lookup [
  timeseries values = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.limits_cpu), by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace}, from: -2m
  | fieldsAdd limits_cpu = arrayFirst(values)
  | limit 20000
], sourceField:id, lookupField:dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace, fields:{limits_cpu}
| fieldsAdd limits_cpu_percent = cpu_usage / limits_cpu * 100
| fieldsAdd cpu_slack = (requests_cpu - cpu_usage) / 1000
| sort cpu_usage desc
| fieldsRename `CPU Usage`=cpu_usage, `CPU Throttled`=cpu_throttled, `CPU Requests`=requests_cpu, `CPU Requests %`=requests_cpu_percent, `CPU Limits`=limits_cpu, `CPU Limits %`=limits_cpu_percent, `CPU Slack`=cpu_slack

19.title: Memory Usage per Namespace

20.title: Memory Quota
20.query:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace, timeframe: timeframe(from: $dt_timeframe_from, to: $dt_timeframe_to)
| fields id, Name = entity.name
| filter in(id, classicEntitySelector(concat("type(CLOUD_APPLICATION_NAMESPACE),toRelationship.isClusterOfNamespace(type(KUBERNETES_CLUSTER),entityName.equals(", $Cluster, "))")))
| lookup [
  timeseries values = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.memory_working_set, default:0), by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace}, from: -2m
  | fieldsAdd memory_usage = arrayFirst(values)
  | limit 20000
], sourceField:id, lookupField:dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace, fields:{memory_usage}
| lookup [
  timeseries values = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.requests_memory), by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace}, from: -2m
  | fieldsAdd requests_memory = arrayFirst(values)
  | limit 20000
], sourceField:id, lookupField:dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace, fields:{requests_memory}
| fieldsAdd requests_memory_percent = memory_usage / requests_memory * 100
| lookup [
  timeseries values = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.limits_memory), by:{dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace}, from: -2m
  | fieldsAdd limits_memory = arrayFirst(values)
  | limit 20000
], sourceField:id, lookupField:dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace, fields:{limits_memory}
| fieldsAdd limits_memory_percent = memory_usage / limits_memory * 100
| fieldsAdd memory_slack = (requests_memory - memory_usage)
| sort memory_usage desc
| fieldsRename `Memory Usage`=memory_usage, `Memory Requests`=requests_memory, `Memory Requests %`=requests_memory_percent, `Memory Limits`=limits_memory, `Memory Limits %`=limits_memory_percent, `Memory Slack`=memory_slack

21.content:
##### This is a **preliminary** version of the Kubernetes cluster dashboard.

---
